title: 7 WNC football games on tap Monday
text:
7 WNC football games on tap Monday Monday night is going to be a busy one across the board for Western North Carolina football. Post to Facebook 7 WNC football games on tap Monday Monday night is going to be a busy one across the board for Western North Carolina football. Check out this story on citizen-times.com: http://avlne.ws/1LdBALV Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 7 WNC football games on tap Monday Andrew Pearson , apearson@citizen-times.com 8:22 a.m. EDT October 5, 2015 
Conditions were muddy for last week's North Henderson-West Henderson football game. (Photo: Colby Rabon) 
Monday night is going to be a busy one across the board for Western North Carolina football. 
Here is the complete list of games rescheduled for tonight with start times provided by the host schools: 
East Henderson at North Henderson, 6 p.m. 
Smoky Mountain at West Henderson, 6 p.m. 
Tuscola at Brevard, 7 p.m. 
Hendersonville at Madison, 7 p.m. 
Rosman at Andrews, 7 p.m. 
North Buncombe at McDowell, 7 p.m. 
Robbinsville at Murphy, 7:30 p.m. 
Athletic directors and coaches: Please report any changes to this schedule by calling (828) 231-1747 or sending an e-mail to apearson@citizen-times.com.
